sentences.english: Never be blinded by private interests.
sentences.chinese: 绝不能让私利挡住了眼睛。

sentences.english: He is a person who never pursues selfish interests.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个从不谋私利的人。

sentences.english: They never pursue self-interests but work wholeheartedly for the revolution.
sentences.chinese: 他们从不谋求私利，而是一心一意为革命工作。

sentences.english: This increases incentive costs and is a negative effect of private benefits.
sentences.chinese: 私利的存在，束紧了这一约束。

sentences.english: Corruption is the use of governmental powers by government officials for illegitimate private gain.
sentences.chinese: 腐败是利用政府权力，政府官员为非法谋取私利。

sentences.english: Justice, like all knowledge, is really a form, again, of self-interest.
sentences.chinese: 正义，一如所有知识，其实是一种私利的形式。

sentences.english: They acted in bad faith, using the name of the group to gain their own selfish ends.
sentences.chinese: 他们做事存心不良，利用集体的名义图谋私利。

sentences.english: In ancient times there was a country magistrate who took bribes and practised graft.
sentences.chinese: 古时候有一个县官，贪污受贿，谋取私利。

sentences.english: Furthermore, they wanted to preserve the Qing court and their own interests.
sentences.chinese: 而且，他们借此保卫清室和维护私利。

sentences.english: Private benefits of control (PBC) are sub-topic of principal-agent theory.
sentences.chinese: 大股东控制权私利是委托代理问题的子话题。

sentences.english: A leader fishes for personal interests by taking advantage of his position and power, which can be described as corruption.
sentences.chinese: 举印者利用手中的权力去捞取个人私利，这就叫腐败。

sentences.english: Exploiting your assets for personal gain.
sentences.chinese: 利用您的资产谋取私利。

sentences.english: Honour and profit lie not sack.
sentences.chinese: 荣誉和私利不能睡在一起。

sentences.english: Using other people for one's own profit is unethical.
sentences.chinese: 利用别人来谋取私利是不道德的。

sentences.english: The basic stumbling block to global peace rests with the self-serving ambitions of many nations .
sentences.chinese: 全世界和平的基本障碍物在于许多国家谋私利的野心。

definition: to make a profit/to gain/to get an advantage
to damage the public interest for personal profit (idiom); personal profit at public expense/venal and selfish behavior
everything for self and selfish profit (idiom); with no regard for others/selfish/mercenary
to see profit and forget morality (idiom); to act from mercenary considerations/to sell one's soul for gain
to seek nothing but profit (idiom); personal profit before everything/self-seeking
to gain from corrupt dealing/to engage in graft/to feather one's nest
harming others for one's personal benefit (idiom); personal gain to the detriment of others
to gain profit (by underhand means)/to exploit/see also 謀取|谋取[mou2 qu3]
